W7-X Format

Format of bc-file.
CC Boozer-coordinate data file
CC Version 0.1
CC Author J.Geiger
CC Created: 30.04.2004
 m0b  n0b nsurf nper flux/[Tm^2]     a/[m]     R/[m]
   36   36   97    5 -2.418619E+00   0.51092   5.52666
       s         iota  curr_pol/nper    curr_tor    pprime   sqrt g(0,0)
                            [A]            [A]   dp/ds,[Pa] (dV/ds)/nper
  1.5306E-02  8.5653E-01 -1.7885E+07 -1.2735E+00 -1.2474E+03 -5.7549E+00
    m    n      R_mn/[m]      Z_mn/[m]          F_mn           bmn/[T]
    0   36  1.66348028E-13 -6.08412908E-14  1.03164537E-13 -1.57826503E-11
    0   35  6.57460332E-14 -1.07438400E-13 -1.59783659E-14 -9.03979668E-12
    0   34 -1.88635922E-12  1.52797654E-12  1.68670282E-13  7.55025114E-12
 ...............

How to read bc-file, initial lines of which are shown above.
  PRORGAM READBC
    ! The following code reads bc-file  
    !    new format is used: for m=0, only n>0 Fourier modes
    INTEGER  m0b,n0b,n0s,Nsymm ! dimensions of Fourier spectras
    REAL(8)  Fluxt             ! toroidal flux [T*m^2]
    REAL(8)  a0minor,R0major   ! minor and major radii

    REAL(8), ALLOCATABLE :: Rmn(:,:,:)   ! [m] 
    REAL(8), ALLOCATABLE :: Zmn(:,:,:)   ! [m] 
    REAL(8), ALLOCATABLE :: Pmn(:,:,:)   ! [rad]
    REAL(8), ALLOCATABLE :: Bmn(:,:,:)   ! [T] 
    REAL(8), ALLOCATABLE :: ss(:)        ! normalised magn. flux
    REAL(8), ALLOCATABLE :: iota(:)      ! 
    REAL(8), ALLOCATABLE :: curp(:)      ! poloidal current
    REAL(8), ALLOCATABLE :: curt(:)      ! toroidal current
    REAL(8), ALLOCATABLE :: pprim(:)     ! dp/ds (p is a presure)
    REAL(8), ALLOCATABLE :: sqg00(:)     ! sqrt(g00)
    CHARACTER(80) txt

    OPEN (01,file=name_config, status='old', action='read')
     
    DO WHILE(.true.)  ! skip comments, if any
     READ (01,'(a)') txt
     IF (txt(1:2)/='cc'.and.txt(1:2)/='CC') exit
    ENDDO

    READ (01,*) m0b,n0b,n0s,Nsymm,Fluxt,a0minor,R0major

    Nharm = (m0b+1)*(2*n0b+1)-n0b       ! total number of stored harm.

    ALLOCATE (ss  (n0s), &              ! surface label[0,..,1]
             iota (n0s), &              ! 
             curp (n0s), &              ! poloidal and ..
             curt (n0s), &              ! toroidal current [A]
             pprim(n0s), &              ! dp/ds (p is a presure)
             sqg00(n0s), STAT=ierror)   ! sqrt(g00)                       
    IF (ierror /= 0) STOP 'Conf_reader 1: error while reading mag. congig.'

    ALLOCATE (Rmn(-n0b:n0b,0:m0b,n0s), &
             Zmn(-n0b:n0b,0:m0b,n0s), &
             Pmn(-n0b:n0b,0:m0b,n0s), &
             Bmn(-n0b:n0b,0:m0b,n0s), STAT=ierror) 
    IF (ierror /= 0) STOP 'Conf_reader 2: error while reading mag. congig.'

    Rmn = 0;  Zmn = 0;  Pmn = 0;  Bmn = 0
      
    DO i=1,n0s
     READ (01,'(a)')  txt,txt ! skip two lines
     READ (01,*) ss(i),iota(i),curp(i),curt(i),pprim(i),sqg00(i)
     READ (01,'(a)')  txt     ! skip line
     DO j=1,Nharm
       READ (01,*) m,n,Rmn(n,m,i),Zmn(n,m,i),Pmn(n,m,i),Bmn(n,m,i)
     ENDDO
    ENDDO  
    CLOSE(01)

  END PROGRAM READBC
